Commands.Shine Edge: BRV magic attack + HP attackSelf: 2 turns MAX BRV Up I
Commands.Runic: Self: Grants 0.5x INT BRV, 2 turns BRV Magic AbsorbTarget: 2 turns Lock
Commands.Spinning Edge: 5-HIT BRV+HP attack.Grants Rune Knight and Medium Attack Up for 5 turns.Rune Knight increases Magic Attack, and grants BRV & HP Regen.

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.BRV Initiative: Raises Speed by 5% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Mighty Shine Edge: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Shine Edge by 10%.
Artifacts.Bravery Runic: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Runic.

Passives.Shine Edge Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Shine Edge.
Passives.HP Damage Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense after taking HP damage.
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Runic Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Runic.
Passives.BRV Live: Prevents Break status if BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Shine Edge Charge: Increases the max uses of Shine Edge by 1.
Passives.HP Damage BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after taking HP damage.
Passives.Target Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack upon attacking an enemy that is targeting the user.
Passives.Pride of the Invincible General: Prevents KO if HP is over 50% and leaves its value at 1.

Weapons.Crystal Sword CP: 15: Increases Shine Edge's potency and grants HP Regen for 4 turns.Increases the potency of Max BRV Up and extends its duration.
Weapons.Lightbringer CP: 35: Raises the BRV gain of Runic and turns BRV Attack to Ice-elemental BRV Attack+ for 4 turns when the ability is used.Grants Small Attack Up for 4 turns and extends the duration of Magic BRV Absorption and Provoke.
